text: The Wind in the Willows is a British stop motion animated television series shown by the ITV network from 1984 to 1990 based on Kenneth Grahame's 1908 story The Wind in the Willows. It stars David Jason, Richard Pearson, Michael Hordern, Ian Carmichael, Peter Sallis, Brian Trueman, Jimmy Hibbert, Daphne Oxenford, and Emma Chambers.
